content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple attempts were made to establish a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) intended to supply Automation Science Packs for research, but each placement and crafting attempt failed due to missing lab items and insufficient resources.  
• Although operations were performed using furnaces (for example, an alternative furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron smelting and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper ore processing), these were pre‐existing and not built or placed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities API Usage Errors  
  – Avoid supplying unexpected keywords (such as 'radius') or an incorrect number of positional arguments. Verify the API’s signature and call it accordingly.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval Issues  
  – Ensure the lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement at a target tile.  
  – Include validation checks to handle cases when retrieval functions return None, instead of attempting to iterate over a NoneType.

• Lab Crafting Failures Due to Insufficient Resources  
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (e.g., iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, copper-plate, copper-cable, electronic-circuit) are available or producible via an established smelting/crafting chain.  
  – Monitor and resolve chain dependencies so that the prerequisites for lab crafting are met before initiating the process.
